games.name: Retro Pac-Man
games.description: Classic Pac-Man with emoji sprites! Eat pellets, avoid ghosts, and rack up points in this retro arcade game.

games.name: Arkanoid
games.description: Break all the bricks with the paddle and ball in this classic! Responsive and playable on desktop and mobile.

games.name: Head Ball
games.description: A one-on-one soccer game with Lamborghini cars! Score goals, unlock power-ups, and enjoy confetti celebrations.
